0.text: Bug 8280  Package view back/forward/up arrow hover help.

1.text: Start up Eclipse with some existing Java Projects in the workspace.

2.text: Select a package in one of these projects.

5.text: Notice that a very tall tool-tip (full screen height) text appears, the first line being "Back to Java Model" and the remaining lines being package names (?).

6.text: Immediately after being displayed, the tool-tip text disappears.

7.text: The text will flash into and out of existance consitently until the pointer leaves the button's frame.

8.text: The same behaviour can occur when hovering over the Up arrow or the Forward arrow when these lead to the workspace root.
